page.title: 18SERVICES IN STOCKTON.
page.content: WITHIN THE VILLAGE OF NORTON ARE 2 LOW ORDER SERVICES, THE GENERAL STORES & A SUB POST OFFICE.THE GENERAL STORES PROVIDES A WIDE RANGE OF DOMESTIC AND HOUSEHOLD GOODS FROM FOOD TO NEWSPAPERS.IT ALSO PROVIDED A TERA ROOM SERVICE. THE SUB POST OFFICE IS RUN BY MRS ROWLEY IN PART OF ER HOUSE IN BRIDGNORTH ROAD. ALL OTHER RETAIL AND SERVICE REQUIREMENTS HAVE TO BE SOUGHT IN BRIDGNORTH OR TELFORD. THE DOCTOR FROM TELFORD OPERATES A SURGERY IN THE VILLAGE HALL ON FRIDAY AFTERNOONS. A NUMBER OF MOBILE SERVICES ENTER ON A REGULAR BASIS, COUNTRY FRESH SHOP, MOBILE LAUNDRY, COAL MERCHANTS, MILK, WINDOW CLEANER,MOBILE LIBRARY AND A DAILYBAKER.THER ARE IRREGULAR BUS SERVICES TO BRIDGNORTH. THE VILLAGE PRIMARY SCHOOL HAS 3O CHILDREN.
